io.requery.sql.platform

Class Generic

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.requery.sql.platform.Generic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Platform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Derby, H2, HSQL, MySQL, Oracle, PostgresSQL, SQLite, SQLServer

    public class Generic
extends Object
implements Platform
    Base platform implementation assuming standard ANSI SQL support.

    • Method Detail

      • addMappings

        public void addMappings(Mapping mapping)
        Description copied from interface: Platform
        Given the attribute and FieldType allows the platform to replace the storage type with a platform specific one. Substitution occurs both for table generation and entity property conversion.
        Specified by:
        addMappings in interface Platform
        Parameters:
        mapping - mapping containing type information of what is being read or written.

      • supportsInlineForeignKeyReference

        public boolean supportsInlineForeignKeyReference()
        Specified by:
        supportsInlineForeignKeyReference in interface Platform
        Returns:
        false if the database requires foreign keys to be defined as columns in the create table statement. true if they can be inlined in one statement.

      • supportsAddingConstraint

        public boolean supportsAddingConstraint()
        Specified by:
        supportsAddingConstraint in interface Platform
        Returns:
        true if the database supports adding a constraint (e.g. foreign key) after the column is created (or if it requires it). In most DDL statements the column is created first and then the constraint is added.

      • supportsIfExists

        public boolean supportsIfExists()
        Specified by:
        supportsIfExists in interface Platform
        Returns:
        true if the database supports the 'if exists' syntax in the create table/index, drop DDL statements.

      • supportsGeneratedKeysInBatchUpdate

        public boolean supportsGeneratedKeysInBatchUpdate()
        Specified by:
        supportsGeneratedKeysInBatchUpdate in interface Platform
        Returns:
        true if the JDBC driver supports reading generated keys via Statement.getGeneratedKeys().

      • supportsGeneratedColumnsInPrepareStatement

        public boolean supportsGeneratedColumnsInPrepareStatement()
        Specified by:
        supportsGeneratedColumnsInPrepareStatement in interface Platform
        Returns:
        true if the JDBC Connection.prepareStatement(String, String[]) method should be used to get the generated key set when inserting records.

      • supportsUpsert

        public boolean supportsUpsert()
        Specified by:
        supportsUpsert in interface Platform
        Returns:
        true if the platform supports an upsert (insert or update) operation either via merge or an alternate syntax that is defined in Platform.upsertGenerator()

      • generatedColumnDefinition

        public GeneratedColumnDefinition generatedColumnDefinition()
        Specified by:
        generatedColumnDefinition in interface Platform
        Returns:
        the type of generated key type DDL this database supports.
